welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Grandview, a charming city known for its picturesque views and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Johnson Executive Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Johnson Executive Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Century Aircenter Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at New Century Aircenter Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
